attributes.additional_details:
The continued attacks on the motorist by way of installation of Speed cameras without the electorates consent is not only a travesty but points towards a route to raise revenue and not based on sound safety principles.

The current government promised no war on motorists however they have continued where the last government left off.

We request that the government allow this matter to be voted on by the general public and not decided on by a few individuals who have no public mandate.
